content_html: Bharatpur, Sept 12: Inmates who escaped from the Bharatpur Jail in Chitwan have started returning voluntarily. Among the inmates who escaped after breaking jails on Wednesday morning, 54 have surrendered. A total of 740 inmates had fled from Bharatpur Jail. Chief of Chitwan District Jail, Ravindra Dh

title: 54 escaped prisoners return to Chitwan Jail
